Posts.Content: Nov 12, 2008 06:56AM renee78 wrote: depends on what your medical records say. unfortunately se's are not always considered. It's based upon if it has spread or reoccurs in order to get it. If you come up for a review which is usally 3-4 years and you are free from disease you will likely be stopped but if it still shows it will not be stopped. wait until you get the final report, then apply. also submit your records with your application it speeds things up. let me know if i can help more.
